title: Oathbreaker
content: d betray them. Betraying Minthara after you agreed to help her. Let Auntie Ethel escape for her boon. Refuse to save Duke Ravengard. Betraying Sovereign Spaw. Steal the githyanki egg. Act 2 Agree to kidnap Isobel. Assisting Marcus during the assault on Last Light Inn. Hurt Dolly Dolly Dolly. Promised to bring Nightsong to Ketheric but failed. Betraying Balthazar. Convincing Madeline to stab herself. Force goblins in the moonrise tower to commit suicide. Act 3 Agree to help Devilish Ox but failed
